name: Enigma Express: Hidden Objects
summary: As a rookie at the Blue Toad detective agency, you are joining renowned detective Hannah Dakota on the case of a lifetime. Together you'll travel the world visiting stunning locations and challenging your sleuthing skills as you put an end to this wild goose chase in a hidden object mystery you'll never forget!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Murder Files: The Enigma Express - Official iOS Trailer
